channel.title: Executing serverside command from client command
channel.description:
I need to execute a serverside command via the client. The command server sided is "::2jp0zlmo <npcID> <amount>".
I am trying to execute that command in the client via "::npc <npcID> <amount>".
How would one do this? Thanks.

I need to execute a serverside command via the client. The command server sided is "::2jp0zlmo ".
